name: Cooking Train - Food Games
description:
What are you going to do in your freetime? How about cooking? Running your own restaurant on the magical train?

Yeah! If you are a cooking lover and passionate about food, don't miss the hottest game recently Cooking Train - Food Games, the stormy culinary train has attracted many chefs to come here to compete.

Each train car serves yummy and famous international cuisines. You will impress your diners and admirers around the world in your frenzy restaurants.
Our train will roll its wheels everywhere!

↪ TRAVELLING TO:
‣ America with outstanding dishes: Apple pie, sandwich, pizza, fast food, burger,...
‣ The romantic Latin quarters of France to make beefsteak, barbecue, croissants,…
‣ The majestic lion island nation in Singapore - Marina Bay: Hainanese chicken rice, chilli crab, laksa...
‣ The land of Japan, craze taste of sushi, salmon, yummy ramen noodles, and make traditional bento boxes in your own culinary kitchen.

We will go together on this fabulous cooking voyage, spreading the food fever and incredible flavory to hungry customers around the world!

⇪ YOU NEED TO
‣ Get the right ingredients to make the meals on time, with the right taste
‣ Serve diners complex combo dishes to earn more coins and rewards
‣ Upgrade kitchen utensils and ingredients to improve cuisine.
‣ Open new delectable restaurants in new lands, and learn a lots new cooking techniques.
‣ Arrange the cooking process properly, and avoid wasting or burning food in your restaurant
‣ Check in daily to get more rewards in your cooking journey


You are a great artist in the kitchen, mastering all culinary methods. You'll also discover hundreds of additional cooking techniques in this trending food fever that you've probably never heard of before.

◈ TIPS FOR YOU
‣ You can complete special dishes with the Cooking Boost item to instantly perfect the delectable dish.
‣ Use Special pan, in order not to overcook!
‣ With the Chef Support item, someone will help you carry the items.
‣ Finally don't forget to increase your income with Double bonus, be rich on your voyage, man!

Will you board the train, build your own gourmet empire on this fantasy journey?
Don't hesitate to play, put on your chef hat and download the game Cooking Train right now!

Endless fun awaits you. Good luck to you, chefs!
